introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is かつりょく which you will often hear in discussions about health, goals, and personal motivation.
meaning_explanation_english: The word 活力 (かつりょく) means vitality or energy. It's used to describe the state of being energetic, lively, or having a lot of vigor.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: エネルギー : エネルギー : energy
synonym_explanation:
The most common synonyms of かつりょく are 
1. エネルギー which refers to physical force and power, often used in both literal and figurative senses. 
2. 元気 which means being in good health or spirits, more general and can apply to mental and physical states.
antonyms: 無気力 : むきりょく : apathy
衰弱 : すいじゃく : weakness
antonym_explanation:
The most common antonyms of かつりょく are 
1. 無気力 which indicates a lack of vigor or motivation, focusing on the absence of energy.
2. 衰弱 which means weakening or loss of strength, stressing the diminishing aspect of energy or vitality.

collocations.kanji: かつりょくをみなぎる
collocations.furigana: かつりょくをみなぎる

example_sentences.kanji: 私は週末に活力をためる。
example_sentences.furigana: 私(わたし)は週末(しゅうまつ)に活力(かつりょく)をためる。

translations.ID: Saya mengumpulkan tenaga di akhir pekan.
translations.ES: Recargo energías los fines de semana.
translations.VI: Tôi nạp năng lượng vào cuối tuần.
translations.FR: Je reprends de l'énergie le week-end.
translations.TL: Naghahakot ako ng lakas tuwing weekends.
translations.MY: ကျွန်ုပ်သည် အပတ်အစဉ်ကုန်ရက်များတွင် စွမ်းအင် ပိုမို၍ ငေါ့ပြီးနေဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: मैं वीकेंड पर ऊर्जा जुटाता हूँ।
translations.AR: أجمع الطاقة في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع.
translations.FA: من در آخر هفته‌ها انرژی را جمع می‌کنم.

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は活力(かつりょく)がある。

translations.MY: သူမှာ စွမ်းအား ရှိပါတယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 活力(かつりょく)が湧(わ)く。

translations.VI: Tôi cảm thấy có động lực.
translations.MY: ငါတက်ကြွစွာခံစားရတယ်။
translations.HI: मुझे उर्जा महसूस हो रही है।

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は活動に活力をみなぎっている。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は活動(かつどう)に活力(かつりょく)をみなぎっている。

translations.EN: He is brimming with energy for the activity.
translations.ID: Dia penuh semangat untuk aktivitas itu.
translations.ES: Él está rebosante de energía para la actividad.
translations.VI: Anh ấy tràn đầy năng lượng cho hoạt động.
translations.NE: उनले क्रियाकलापको लागि ऊर्जा प्रचुर छ।
translations.ZH: 他充满活力去参加活动。
translations.TL: Punong-puno siya ng enerhiya para sa gawain.
translations.MY: သူသည် လှုပ်ရှားမှုအတွက် စွမ်းအင်ပြည့်ဝနေသည်။
translations.HI: वह गतिविधि के लिए ऊर्जा से भरपूर है।
translations.FA: او پر از انرژی برای فعالیت است.

example_sentences.kanji: 私は朝に活力を出します。
example_sentences.furigana: 私は(わたしは)朝(あさ)に活力(かつりょく)を出(だ)します。

translations.EN: I am energized in the morning.
translations.VI: Tôi tràn đầy năng lượng vào buổi sáng.
translations.FR: Je suis plein d'énergie le matin.
translations.TL: Ako ay puno ng sigla sa umaga.
translations.MY: နငျကျနတေြကျြးမှာငါစကျးမှုရှိပါတယ်။
translations.HI: मैं सुबह में ऊर्जा महसूस करता हूँ।
translations.FA: من صبح ها انرژی می گیرم.
